Manzardo homers off Civale in Guardians' win CHICAGO -- Guardians first baseman Kyle Manzardo was getting some pregame defensive work in on Saturday morning when he stopped. White Sox right-hander Aaron Civale came across the field to introduce himself to the 24-year-old, and they shared a brief conversation. play-51 Game Recap play-52 Condensed Game Watch Archive carousel-arrow-right-101 Player of the Game Player of the Game Manzardo 1-4 HR, K, 3 RBI +35.3% WPA See Leaderboard arrow-next-4 Top Performers Benintendi 3 - 3 HR, BB, RBI, R Slater 2 - 3 HR, 2 RBI, R Clase, E W, 2.0 IP 0 H, 0 ER, 2 SO Team Comparison R H HR TB SB LOB E Guardians 6 5 1 9 0 3 0 White Sox 5 9 2 19 0 6 1 More Coverage As 1st half ends, White Sox looking to follow '05 champs example Key Moments Scoring All Video Home Runs Strikeouts Hard Hit Balls Lead Changes Win Probability Swings Bottom 4th Bases. 0 - 0, 0 Outs Home Run Austin Slater homers (4) on a fly ball to left center field.
